product_name: Park Home Bench Mount Repair Stand - PCS-12
long_description: This is a bench-mounted version of Park's PCS-10 Home Mechanic repair stand. Features a quick-adjusting, cam-type clamp that fits tubes up to 76mm and rotates 360deg for easy access to any part of the bike. Clamping pressure is fully adjustable to prevent damage to thin-walled tubes. Durable powdercoat finish. Mounts to any flat surface; mounting bolts not included.
short_description: This is a bench-mounted version of Park's PCS-10 Home Mechanic repair stand.
